fields.title: Knobs
fields.description: "Depth" controls amount of compression. "Time" controls attack/release times of all bands. The other two are Input and Output gain controls.

fields.title: Bands
fields.description: A visual display of input and gain reduction over the low/mid/high bands.

fields.title: Presets
fields.description: Select the preset to match your music by clicking and listening for the good stuff to happen.

fields.title: OSC, FX and Global tabs
fields.description: On the FX tab you can apply a large range of useful audio effects without leaving the LiquidPlant.

fields.title: Oscillators
fields.description: Choose from regular waveforms, wavetables, samples, and noise for your source sounds.

fields.title: Modulation
fields.description: LiquidPlant's unique modular modulation section allows you to connect modulators and utilities in an infinite number of combinations for ultimate control, or ultimate chaos.

fields.title: Parameters
fields.description: Consists of the main, stereo, speed, quality, sidechain and output sections.

fields.title: Frequency and reduction graph
fields.description:
The blue area — shows the parts of the signal being reduced.
The white curve with colored EQ nodes — controls which frequency areas are processed.

fields.title: Oscillators
fields.description: At its core Quieth1 houses 4 alias-free unison oscillators, which generate analog shaped waveforms.

fields.title: Filters
fields.description: There are 2 state of the art, pure analog sounding filter sections.

fields.title: Modulation
fields.description: Quieth1 offers many modulation options to sculpture the sound any way you like.

fields.title: Master FX
fields.description: A set of 7 professional quality sound effects, conveniently grouped into an LCD panel structure.
